data.title: Awesome Home Made Ice Cream and Great Service
data.text:
If you are looking for real homemade ice cream and unique flavors in a 1950s soda fountain look, this is definitely the place to go!

We stopped by on a Saturday afternoon this summer, and were excited to see that they were not selling someone else's ice cream, but making their own.  Our 6 year old kept talking about how great their vanilla ice cream was the entire time we were there.  

The restaurant is family owned, and they are all very friendly.  We had a nice conversation when the line died down, and they were very friendly.

My guess is the place is pretty crowded when school is in (its right across the street from a high school and close to Moravian College), but while we were there we were able to get a table right away, and had a great experience.  We will definitely look for an excuse to come and visit this place again.

data.title: Outstanding!
data.text: Amazing ice cream shop!  The flavors and quality of the ice cream are unsurpassed.  The service was courteous and friendly.  A great range of flavors, including Indian varieties.  The saffron pistachio is to die for.  Excellent sugar-free Tahitian vanilla. I can't wait to return to try more.

data.title: Awesome Ice Cream Parlor
data.text: A great place to meet up with friends or have a good and sweet time with your family. This place offers a wide range of American and Indian (yes Indian!) ice cream flavor and is a must try. Yummy !!!

data.title: Very Creative Ice Cream
data.text:
Very creative and inventive flavors of ice cream! Friendly staff and the owner came by to talk to us about how he makes his ice cream. Family run homemade ice shop is a real treat.
The only downside is the ice cream is expensive for the portion size you get. I also felt the my ice cream had picked up the flavor of other ice creams by using the same scooper.

data.title: Homemade Penn State creamery ice cream
data.text: I absolutely recommend you try Nuts About Ice Cream.  If you want a good quality product at a reasonable price this review is for you.   Always offering 30 different choices most of which I have tried and they don't disappoint.   Give yourself a treat and give it a whirl.

data.title: Old fashioned ice cream bar
data.text: They make many different flavor of ice cream as well as the usual flavors. They all are freshly made on site by the owner. They have been selling i.e. cream from this location for at least 15 years. I cannot remember all the unusual flavors but has tasted most of them and they are are really delicious.

data.title: Mango sorbet
data.text: So I'm vegan and I was sad to have to give up my fav ice cream store!  Didn't they adapt in a super way!  At least 5 flavors every time I go in.  Lately I'm hooked on mango sorbet!  Ya gotta get some

data.title: Good ice cream with exotic flavors
data.text: Unusual flavors that are quite good. The passion fruit sorbet was delicious. Friendly service. Only complaint is that the place is a bit cluttered.

data.title: 5 Stars
data.text: My family and I were staying in Bethlehem for an overnight and happened to find this little ice cream place nearby. We're so glad we did because I guarantee you'll never find another ice cream place like it! All of the flavors looked delicious, but my husband and I knew we had to get the cardamom kulfi and saffron pistachio flavors. They did not disappoint. Not only was the ice cream delicious, the place was so cute and the owners were so friendly. We ended up staying and chatting while enjoying the ice cream. We will definitely be back again and with more family!

data.title: Flavors you won't find anywhere else in Bethlehem
data.text: Have been enjoying this ice cream for years and the quality and selection has been consistenly delicioust. Adorable couple makes exotic flavors like Cardamom kulfi with caramel. You should taste what they do with saffron! Mango! Pistachios!

data.title: Mad for Mango? Crazy about Coconut??
data.text:
Best spot for special homemade ice cream and sorbet selections to add a dessert flourish to your Thai or Indian dinner!  Try the saffron pistachio ice cream or guava sorbet or go for the more traditional but above average chocolate marshmallow, chocolate chip mint or sweet cream.  
A birthday or special occasion cake can be ordered in any exotic flavor combination.

data.title: yummy ice cream in Bethlehem
data.text: Stopped by on Labor Day weekend (hoping for the fig ice cream, but alas, they were sold out).  Tried some great flavors including saffron pistachio. Settled on chocolate and peanut butter and coconut (YUMMY!). Everyone in our group was satisfied. Great service, helpful and personable.  Space a bit cluttered (just moving in?)

data.title: Yum
data.text: Awesome homemade ice. Wide assortment of favors, with fresh fruit topping. Great customer service. The old-time feel.

data.title: Awesome Ice-cream Place
data.text: Be it a family outing or catching up with your buddies or co-workers this place offers satisfaction for all classes and ages of its customers. Great and fun filled place to be at for ice creams, shakes and coffee 👍

data.title: Omg needs more stars
data.text: This is hands down the best ice cream store in the Lehigh valley and maybe Pennsylvania!  Worth the trip to have saffron pistachio ice cream that is hand made(extra heap of nuts)!  And one cannot forget to have the absolutely delectable kulfi ice cream!  What r u waiting for go now!

data.title: Best ice cream I have ever tasted
data.text: We visited here about two weeks ago when the line at our usual place was too long and have been obsessed ever since. Words can not do it justice. The mango sorbet is life changing. We have also tried apricot, salted caramel, saffron pistachio and even the vanilla is incredible.JUST GO!!!!

data.title: Amazing.
data.text: Simply a great place to get ice cream.  Visit as often as you can.  The selections are wonderful and the owners delightful.  Call ahead for fresh packed take away.

data.title: Hands down the BEST ice cream you will ever have!
data.text: This is truly the best ice cream you will ever have. It is homemade on the premises and they have wonderful flavors! You can get good old fashioned chocolate or salty caramel. I love the coconut almond joy! Don't even bother looking anywhere else for ice cream if you are in Bethlehem!

data.title: Unique homemade ice cream
data.text: I've been here several times and am never disappointed. There is always something new to try. Little known fact that their chai tea is also the best I've ever had.

data.title: Omg Indian ice cream
data.text: Hand made ice cream!  Don't go anywhere else for ice cream.. May not be a fancy place but hey we're here for ice cream and great at that.
